name: Poornima Institute of Engineering & Technology (PIET), Jaipur
location: RIICO Institutional Area, Sitapura, Jaipur, Rajasthan
scholarships: Merit scholarships, govt schemes (NSS/NSP), institute-specific concessions — eligibility varies by merit & income
notes: Large private group institute in Jaipur; detailed fee breakdown on college site (tuition + development + RTU fees).

name: Poornima College of Engineering (PCE), Jaipur
scholarships: Merit-based awards and government scholarships; special concessions for top scorers
notes: Part of Poornima group; total fees often show tuition + accreditation + development + RTU one-time fees.

name: Rajasthan Institute of Engineering & Technology (RIET), Jaipur
estimated_fee_range_per_year: B.Tech ≈ ₹85,000 - ₹98,000 (tuition annual); total course fees 3–5 L approx depending on program
scholarships: Merit & need-based scholarships; placement-linked scholarships; govt schemes apply
notes: Official fee page lists tuition + caution + RTU dev fee; fees can be revised by state fee committee.

name: B.K. Birla Institute of Engineering & Technology (BKBIET), Pilani
location: CEERI Road, Pilani, Jhunjhunu District, Rajasthan
estimated_fee_range_per_year: B.Tech ≈ ₹53,000 - ₹1,90,000 (varies by seat type and branch); typical reported ~₹53,800/year for some seats
scholarships: Institute merit scholarships; government scholarships; placement scholarships for high performers

contact.phone: +91-01596-246092 (RTU/BTU cell) / admissions helpline listed on site

notes: Established, well-known private engineering college in Pilani with placement activities and multiple fee categories.

name: Bal Krishna Institute of Technology (BKIT), Kota

scholarships: Some merit scholarships & govt scholarship schemes; contact college for exact scholarship program
notes: Smaller private engineering college; fee documents and fee-challan available on college site.

contact.phone: Admissions numbers listed on directories (see college pages)

name: Sawai Madhopur College of Engineering & Technology, Sawai Madhopur

notes: Directory listings show ~₹1.96L total for UG programs (estimates).

name: Vedic Gurukul Institute of Engineering & Technology (VGIET), Jaipur

notes: Directory pages list annual and total ranges; confirm with admissions office for exact seat-specific amounts.
